The article was published by Now8News: which is a known fake news website designed to resemble a local television news outlet.
The story is not original: but rather a rip-off of a long-circulating urban legend about a female shopper who mistakenly believes she has been shot after a can of biscuits explodes inside her hot car.
The image of the alleged shoplifter used: but a photo that has been circulating on the internet since April 2010.
